weapons.name: Black Knife
weapons.flavorText:
Dagger once belonging to one of the assassins who murdered Godwyn the Golden on the Night of the Black Knives. 
A ritual performed on the oddly misshapen blade imbued it with the power of the stolen Rune of Death.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Black Knife is a rare Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Black Knife comes with Blade Of Death Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Blade Of Calling
weapons.flavorText:
Dagger given to one who set out on a journey to fulfill her duty long ago. The power of its former owner, the kindling maiden, is still apparent. 
The one who walks alongside flame, Shall one day meet the road of Destined Death.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Blade Of Calling is a rare Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Blade Of Calling comes with Blade Of Gold Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bloodstained Dagger
weapons.flavorText:
Dagger with a bloodstained blade. 
Afflicts targets with blood loss. 
As blood darkened the dagger through repeated slashing and stabbing, its blade only grew sharper and harder.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bloodstained Dagger is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Bloodstained Dagger comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Celebrant's Sickle
weapons.flavorText:
Sickle decorated with flowers and many-coloured fabrics.
Ceremonial tool used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula. Its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard. 
Crafted from human bone.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Celebrant's Sickle is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Celebrant's Sickle comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cinquedea
weapons.flavorText:
Short sword given to high ranking clergymen of Farum Azula. 
The design celebrates a beast's five fingers, symbolic of the intelligence once granted upon their kind.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cinquedea is a rare Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Cinquedea comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Crystal Knife
weapons.flavorText:
A knife made by sharpening hard crystal. Signature weapon of glintstone miners. 
Used as a tool to extract glintstone from broken rock, and as such a faint magic enwreathes the blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Crystal Knife is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Crystal Knife comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.flavorText:
A standard dagger with a straight blade. 
Though modest in reach and capacity for harm, this weapon is light enough to jab in rapid succession and delivers devastating critical hits.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dagger is a common Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Dagger comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Duchess' Dagger
weapons.flavorText:
A dagger carried by the Duchess known to symbolize the virtue of her family.
Though she was not born into her adopted house, she was welcomed into it with open arms.
And though unrelated by blood, the nobility and righteousness of her clan took root within her heart.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Duchess' Dagger is a common Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Duchess' Dagger comes with Magic Dagger Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Erdsteel Dagger
weapons.flavorText:
An erdsteel dagger with a grass crest engraved upon its blade. Carried by the Erdtree royalty for self-defense in times of peace. 
Though forged to a high standard, the weapon is difficult to wield.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Erdsteel Dagger is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Erdsteel Dagger comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Glintstone Kris
weapons.flavorText: Ritual blade once presented to Leyndell by the Academy of Raya Lucaria to celebrate their newfound peace. Though the weapon is embedded with precious glintstones and features Erdtree ornamentation, the undulating blade is symbolic of an ancient ritual.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Glintstone Kris is a rare Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Glintstone Kris comes with Glintstone Dart Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Great Knife
weapons.flavorText:
Large knife with a broad, curved blade. 
This weapon is designed to slash and rend, inflicting blood loss upon the recipient.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Great Knife is a common Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Great Knife comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ivory Sickle
weapons.flavorText:
Sickle fashioned from ivory. Weapon carried by aged Albunaurics. 
These weapons are evidence of their dedication to the Haligtree, despite never having entered its presence.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ivory Sickle is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ivory Sickle comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Misericorde
weapons.flavorText:
Dagger favored by military physicians in white. The pointed blade is hard and sharp, making critical hits especially potent.
 Medicine is mercy, and mercy upon the battlefield is ruthless. Beware the killers clothed as men of compassion.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Misericorde is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Misericorde comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Reduvia
weapons.flavorText:
Jagged dagger with a distinctive curled blade. Carried by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood. 
This dagger rips the flesh as it enters, inflicting blood loss with sickening efficacy. A proud testament to the success of its vicious design, this weapon is perpetually coated in blood.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Reduvia is a rare Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Reduvia comes with Reduvia Blood Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Parrying Dagger
weapons.flavorText:
A knife with curved handguards. Designed to parry, turning foes' attacks against them. 
For master of combat who anticipate every enemy strike and counter accordingly, this weapon is all they need.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Parrying Dagger is a common Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Parrying Dagger comes with Parry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Scorpion's Stinger
weapons.flavorText:
Dagger fashioned from a great scorpion's tail, glistening with scarlet rot. 
A ceremonial tool used by heretics, crafted from the relic of a sealed outer god.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Scorpion's Stinger is a rare Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Scorpion's Stinger comes with Repeating Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Wakizashi
weapons.flavorText:
Short sword with a tempering pattern on the blade. A weapon unique to warriors of the Land of Reeds. Afflicts targets with blood loss. 
These swords are considered auxiliary weapons. Yet, one man is known to wield this weapon in his left hand while using a full-sized katana in his right. A demonic swordsman known only as Okina.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Wakizashi is a uncommon Dagger in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Wakizashi comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Broadsword
weapons.flavorText:
A straight sword with a wide blade, suited to slashing attacks.
 Horizontal swings boast wide attack range, making it easier to connect with foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Broadsword is a common Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Broadsword comes with Square Off Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cane Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Beloved sword of an aged knight whose last quest was long behind him, repurposed into a walking stick. The tip is rather worn. 
Though bent of back and without the brawn required even to raise the sword aloft, still he wished to meet his end with weapon in hand.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cane Sword is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Cane Sword comes with Square Off Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Carian Knight's Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Straight sword embedded with a blue glintstone. Weapon of knights sworn to Carian royalty. 
These knights' swords could serve as catalysts, letting them wield sorcerous battle skills. Despite numbering fewer than twenty, this power made them a match for even the champions of gold in battle.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Carian Knight's Sword is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Carian Knight's Sword comes with Carian Grandeur Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Coded Sword
weapons.flavorText: Hidden sword once granted to the Tarnished of the Roundtable by the Two Fingers. A formless cipher comprises its blade, which deals holy damage no shield can repel. Champions would gather at the Roundtable Hold in days long past, when the Two Fingers were masters of oration, their flesh yet full of vigor.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Coded Sword is a rare Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Holy damage and has Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Coded Sword comes with Unblockable Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Crystal Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Sword fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. 
Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence. The inscrutable Crystalians have but one clear purpose; to safeguard their crystals unto the end. One theory posits that they yearn for the return of their creator who will carve for them new brethren.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Crystal Sword is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Crystal Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Golden Epitaph
weapons.flavorText:
A sword made to commemorate the death of Godwyn the Golden, first of the demigods to die.
 Infused with the humble prayer of a young boy; "O brother, lord brother, please die a true death."
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Golden Epitaph is a rare Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Golden Epitaph comes with Last Rites Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Lazuli Glintstone Sword
weapons.flavorText:
A sword with a glintstone in its handguards. Wielded by scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus who seek to master Carian sorcery. 
Deals magic damage. 
Apparently once used as a staff of sorcery, this sword is made of wood.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Lazuli Glintstone Sword is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Lazuli Glintstone Sword comes with Glintstone Pebble Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Longsword
weapons.flavorText:
A straight sword with a double-edged blade. 
In addition to its reliable standard damage, this weapon can also perform powerful piercing attacks. A superbly balanced armament.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Longsword is a common Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Longsword comes with Square Off Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army. 
Though blackened and damaged by years of use, it appears to have otherwise been kept in a servicable condition, despite the soldiers having long since lost their minds.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Lordsworn's Straight Sword is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Lordsworn's Straight Sword comes with Square Off Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Miquellan Knight's Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Sword forged by servants of Miquella of the Haligtree, with a design modeled after those carried by Carian knights. Instead of glintstone however, amber from the Haligtree is embedded in the blade. 
A sumptuous piece, yet it has never been offered to any knight  an ill-starred sword with no master. Skill: Sacred Blade
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Miquellan Knight's Sword is a rare Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Miquellan Knight's Sword comes with Sacred Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Noble's Slender Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Narrow blade carried by wandering nobles. 
Made to be easy to wield. 
Daubed with gold from tip to tail, it should fetch a good sum.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Noble's Slender Sword is a common Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Noble's Slender Sword comes with Square Off Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ornamental Straight Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Slender straight sword patterned after an antique ornament. Superior swordsmen prefer to wield one in each hand.
 After falling from grace, the dregs of the golden lineage sought power and purpose in the past.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ornamental Straight Sword is a rare Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ornamental Straight Sword comes with Golden Tempering Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Regalia Of Eochaid
weapons.flavorText:
Treasured sword of Eochaid, a lesser, long-vanished domain. 
The copper coloration is not to be confused for rust, but is a conduit for its wielder to move it by their will alone. 
Swords of Eochaid dance through the skies
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Regalia Of Eochaid is a rare Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Regalia Of Eochaid comes with Eochaid's Dancing Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rotten Crystal Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Sword fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. It festers with scarlet rot.
 Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rotten Crystal Sword is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Rotten Crystal Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Short Sword
weapons.flavorText:
A short straight sword with a short blade. 
In addition to its reliable standard damage, this weapon also boasts powerful piercing attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Short Sword is a common Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Short Sword comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Sword Of Night And Flame
weapons.flavorText:
Storied sword and treasure of Caria Manor. One of the legendary armaments. 
Astrologers, who preceded the sorcerers, established themselves in mountaintops that nearly touched the sky, and considered the Fire Giants their neighbors.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Sword Of Night And Flame is a legendary Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical, Magic and Fire damage and has Strength, Intelligence, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Sword Of Night And Flame comes with Night-and-flame Stance Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Sword Of St Trina
weapons.flavorText:
Silver sword carried by clerics of St. Trina. Inflicts sleep ailment upon foes. 
St. Trina is an enigmatic figure. Some say she is a comely young girl, others are sure he is a boy. The only certainty is that their appearance was as sudden as their disappearance.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Sword Of St Trina is a rare Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Sleep buildup on hit.
Sword Of St Trina comes with Mists Of Slumber Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Warhawk's Talon
weapons.flavorText: Talon-swords are affixed to the legs of the Stormveil's warhawks, but this one has been repurposed for human use. The blade is thin and lightweight so as not to obstruct the hawk's mobility.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Warhawk's Talon is a uncommon Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Warhawk's Talon comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Weathered Straight Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Straight sword with a rather short but wide blade. 
Simple to wield, it was known as the sword of the people. 
Though the Erdtree styling is still visible, time has not been kind to this sword, now merely a shadow of its former self.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Weathered Straight Sword is a common Straight Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Weathered Straight Sword comes with Square Off Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Alabaster Lord's Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword forged from a blue-white meteoric ore. The blade conceals gravity-manipulating magic. 
A weapon unique to the Alabaster Lords, a race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Alabaster Lord's Sword is a rare Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Intelligence and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Alabaster Lord's Sword comes with Alabaster Lord's Pull Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Banished Knight's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
A finely-crafted greatsword intricately engraved with an ancient motif. Given to knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. 
Most of these knights were sent to the fringes, where they were forced to start anew with only despair for company.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Banished Knight's Greatsword is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Banished Knight's Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bastard Sword
weapons.flavorText:
A large sword with a straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wieldedwith two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient.
The hefty blade can be swung into multiple foes at once thanks to the broad, sweeping attack, making fending off crowds all the easier.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bastard Sword is a common Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Bastard Sword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Blasphemous Blade
weapons.flavorText:
Sacred sword of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. 
Remains of the countless heroes he has devoured writhe upon the surface of this blade. 
Now they share the same blood, bound together as family.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Blasphemous Blade is a legendary Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Blasphemous Blade comes with Taker's Flames Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Claymore
weapons.flavorText:
A large sword with a long, straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wielded with two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient. 
In addition to the heavy sweeping attacks, it can also make a heavy piercing thrust making this a versatile weapon.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Claymore is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Claymore comes with Lion's Claw Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dark Moon Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
A Moon Greatsword, bestowed by a Carian queen upon her spouse to honor long-standing tradition. One of the legendary armaments.
 Ranni's sigil is a full moon, cold and leaden, and this sword is but a beam of its light.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dark Moon Greatsword is a legendary Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Frostbite buildup on hit.
Dark Moon Greatsword comes with Moonlight Greatsword Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Death's Poker
weapons.flavorText:
Barbed rod carried by Deathbirds. 
The birds are graveyard fire keepers; it is said they rake out the ashen remains of the dead from their kilns.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Death's Poker is a rare Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Intelligence and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Frostbite buildup on hit.
Death's Poker comes with Ghostflame Ignition Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Flamberge
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword featuring a flame-like undulation. Shreds enemy flesh, inducing blood loss.
 Scarlet rot is kept at bay with flame at Redmane Castle, and as such, this beloved sword of Jerren's eventually became the symbol of the castle itself.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Flamberge is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Flamberge comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Forked Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Oddly shaped greatsword wielded by imps. 
The gently undulating forked blade is known as an "imp's tongue" and causes blood loss.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Forked Greatsword is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Forked Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Blackblade
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze greatsword wielded by Valiant Gargoyles mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage.
 Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Blackblade is a rare Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Blackblade comes with Corpse Wax Cutter Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze greatsword wielded by Valiant Gargoyles. 
Just like the wielder, the missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Greatsword is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Greatsword comes with Vacuum Slice Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Golden Order Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword made of light, modeled after the Elden Ring itself. Forged by King Consort Radagon to proudly symbolize the tenets of the Golden Order. One of the legendary armaments. 
Telltale signs betray that this was once the greatsword bequeathed to him by his first wife, Rennala.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Golden Order Greatsword is a legendary Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Golden Order Greatsword comes with Establish Order Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Helphen's Steeple
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword patterned after the black steeple of the Helphen, the lampwood which guides the dead of the spirit world. 
The lamplight is similar to grace in appearance, only it is said that it can only be seen by those who met their death in battle.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Helphen's Steeple is a rare Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Intelligence and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Helphen's Steeple comes with Ruinous Ghostflame Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Inseparable Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Sword forged by compounding silver and gold. A sacred weapon to hunt Those Who Live in Death. Deals holy damage. 
The inseparable twins found solace in the Golden Order, the only institution not to revile them as accursed beings.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Inseparable Sword is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Inseparable Sword comes with Sacred Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Iron Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword with a blade of unusually thick steel. 
A coarse weapon to which polishing is a foreign concept. 
Weighty even among others of its class, the impact of each strike is sure to be felt.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Iron Greatsword is a common Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Iron Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Knight's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword bestowed upon skilled swordsmen in the demigods' service, and yet had no rank or title. 
Featuring a long grip enabling a dual-handed use, this weapon was designed to dispatch larger foes. Being charged with such a duty was undoubtedly a great honor.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Knight's Greatsword is a uncommon Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Knight's Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Lordsworn's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.
 Through blackened and damaged by years of use, it appears to have otherwise been kept in a serviceable condition, despite the soldiers having long since lost their minds.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Lordsworn's Greatsword is a common Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Lordsworn's Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Marais Executioner's Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Storied sword of House Marais, the family of executioners who presided over the Shaded Castle. One of the legendary armaments.
 Elemer of the Briar, the Bell Bearing Hunter, snatched the sword from the site of his looming execution, and furnished it with battle skills from his home of Eochaid..
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Marais Executioner's Sword is a legendary Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Marais Executioner's Sword comes with Eochaid's Dancing Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ordovis's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword of Ordovis, one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights. 
This sword is imbued with an ancient holy essence. Its red tint exemplifies the nature of primordial gold, said to be close in nature to life itself.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ordovis's Greatsword is a rare Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ordovis's Greatsword comes with Ordovis's Vortex Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Sacred Relic Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Sword wrought from the remains of a god who should have lived a life eternal. 
Thoughts on what the weapon portends are many and varied. Some consider it the mark of a great sin, or a sign of great devastation. Some think of it as the end of an age, while others; the beginning.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Sacred Relic Sword is a legendary Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Sacred Relic Sword comes with Wave Of Gold Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Sword Of Milos
weapons.flavorText:
Sinister greatsword fashioned from a giant's backbone.
 Metes out wounds like a lopsided saw-blade.
Milos was undersized for a giant, and was viewed as sullied and terribly grotesque.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Sword Of Milos is a rare Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Sword Of Milos comes with Shriek Of Milos Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Wylder's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
A single-edged greatsword that is tattered and dull.
Worn beyond repair but ingrained with unrelenting vegeance, this weapon recalls the numerous foes felled by the Wylder.
Strike, smash, gouge. Any foe is game, as long as a weapon is handy.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Wylder's Greatsword is a common Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Wylder's Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Godslayer's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Sacred sword of the Gloam-Eyed Queen who controlled the Godskin Apostles before her defeat at the hands of Maliketh.
The black flames wielded by the apostles are channeled from this sword.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Godslayer's Greatsword is a rare Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Godslayer's Greatsword comes with The Queen's Black Flame Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Grafted Blade Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
The storied sword of Castle Morne. A revenger's weapon, it is burdened with oceans of anger and regret. One of the legendary armaments.
 
A lone surviving champion from a country now vanished was so determined to continue fighting that he claimed the swords of an entire clan of warriors.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Grafted Blade Greatsword is a legendary Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Grafted Blade Greatsword comes with Oath Of Vengeance Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
A coarse iron lump of an ultra greatsword. Mows down foes by utilizing its incredible weight.
 Though handling it likely requires the wielder to have surpassed the realm of the merely human, it is precisely for this reason the weapon is used to slaughter even inhuman foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Greatsword is a common Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Maliketh's Black Blade
weapons.flavorText:
Maliketh's black blade which once harbored the power of the Rune of Death. A sad shadow of its former glory. 
After a fragment of Death was stolen on that fateful night, Maliketh bound the blade within his own flesh, such that none might ever rob Death again.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Maliketh's Black Blade is a legendary Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Maliketh's Black Blade comes with Destined Death Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Royal Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword decorated in royal Carian Style. Favored weapon of Blaidd the Half-Wolf. 
In defiance of the fate he was born to, Blaidd swore to serve no master but Ranni. As proof the sword was imbued with a cold magic at the moment oath was sworn.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Royal Greatsword is a rare Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Royal Greatsword comes with Wolf's Assault Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ruins Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Originally rubble from a ruin which fell from the sky, this surviving fragment was honed into a weapon. One of the legendary armaments.
 The ruin it came from crumbled when struck by a meteorite, as such this weapon harbors its destructive power.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ruins Greatsword is a legendary Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ruins Greatsword comes with Wave Of Destruction Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Starscourge Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Curved greatswords of black steel wielded by General Radahn. A pair of weapons decorated with a lion mane motif.
 Radahn earned considerable renown as the Starscourge in his youth, and it is said that it was during this time he engraved the gravity crest upon these blades.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Starscourge Greatsword is a legendary Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Starscourge Greatsword comes with Starcaller Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Troll's Golden Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Sword given to the lesser giants who fought for the Erdtree during the War against the Giants long ago. 
Though the giants have lost their minds, they stay inseparable from their swords that are in sad shapesuch that the gold plating had flaked away.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Troll's Golden Sword is a uncommon Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Troll's Golden Sword comes with Troll's Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Troll Knight's Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword embedded with a blue glintstone. Weapon of the trolls in service to the royal family of Caria. 
Called into service when the Queen invoked an oath they swore, the trolls are treated as true knights of Caria, and fight arm in arm with their human comrades.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Troll Knight's Sword is a uncommon Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Troll Knight's Sword comes with Troll's Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Watchdog's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Stone greatsword wielded by Erdtree Burial Watchdogs.
 Though decorated with the watchman's eye, the pupil was taken by graverobbers and is now hollow, leaving this sword a mere lump of stone.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Watchdog's Greatsword is a uncommon Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Watchdog's Greatsword comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Zweihander
weapons.flavorText:
Just about the largest sword a mere man is capable of swinging. True to its name, it is designed to be wielded in both hands, but those of merely ordinary strength will still struggle to do so. 
The long blade is heavy and sharp, sending foes reeling back with its broader strokes, while also capable of a devastating piercing thrust.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Zweihander is a common Colossal Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Zweihander comes with Stamp (upward Cut) Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Antspur Rapier
weapons.flavorText:
Spur of a giant ant which has been fashioned into a rapier. The blade drips with scarlet rot. 
Scarlet rot is an old legend, of which Maleigh Marais of the Shaded Castle was a private believer. And indeed, he eventually found his own personal goddess.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Antspur Rapier is a rare Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Antspur Rapier comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cleanrot Knight's Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Piercing sword of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella.
 Mainly used as a backup weapon, in combination with a long-handled armament.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cleanrot Knight's Sword is a uncommon Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Cleanrot Knight's Sword comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Estoc
weapons.flavorText:
Large piercing sword with a long, hard bladed edge which is also capable of slashing attacks. 
For its large size, it can be wielded rather nimbly, leaving little opportunity for the enemy to counter.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Estoc is a common Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Estoc comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Frozen Needle
weapons.flavorText:
A razor-thin piercing blade of ice Forged by Iji, the carian Royal Blackmith.
Can inflict frost upon enemies, and launch its blade with a strong attack. The blade immediately regenerates.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Frozen Needle is a rare Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Frostbite buildup on hit.
Frozen Needle comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Noble's Estoc
weapons.flavorText: Estoc carried by wandering nobles. Made to be easy to wield. Daubed with gold from tip to tail, it should fetch a good sum.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Noble's Estoc is a common Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Noble's Estoc comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rapier
weapons.flavorText:
A piercing sword with a sharp, slender blade. 
In addition to this weapon's thrusting attack prowess, it also boasts the ability to be used while guarding with a shield. 
As one of the smaller piercing swords, quick successive thrust area easy to perform, but without a cutting edge, it cannot be used for slashing attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rapier is a common Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Rapier comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rogier's Rapier
weapons.flavorText:
Piercing sword of superior quality, featuring intricate ornamentation. Signature weapon of the sorcerer Rogier. 
High dexterity is required to wield the blade to its full potential, but mastery is a sight to behold, characterized by a flowing style which excels in successive attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rogier's Rapier is a uncommon Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Rogier's Rapier comes with Repeating Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bloody Helice
weapons.flavorText:
Ominous piercing sword with a winding blade. Carried by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood. 
Designed to bore into flesh, causing severe blood loss at the wound. The extracted blood trickles gracefully down the length of the blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bloody Helice is a rare Heavy Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Bloody Helice comes with Dynast's Finesse Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dragon King's Cragblade
weapons.flavorText:
Piercing Gravel Stone sword containing primeval lightning. A portion of the Dragonlord's power, gained from a remembrance. 
This weapon commands great power over the paltry, mortal dragons of today.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dragon King's Cragblade is a legendary Heavy Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Lightning damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Dragon King's Cragblade comes with Thundercloud Form Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Godskin Stitcher
weapons.flavorText:
Elegant piercing sword with a celadon colored blade wielded by Godskin Nobles. 
The nobles possess skill with the sword unmatched by any lowborn. Despite its size, successive attacks from this weapon are swifter than the eye can follow.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Godskin Stitcher is a uncommon Heavy Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Godskin Stitcher comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Great Epee
weapons.flavorText:
Large rapier featuring a thin, sharp blade. Commonly used in life or death duels.
 Like its smaller counterparts, it is made for thrusting attacks, and can be used while guarding with a shield.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Great Epee is a common Heavy Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Great Epee comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bandit's Curved Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword with a light, crescent-shaped blade. Used by the bandits who ran rampant in the wake of the Shattering. 
Most of the blade is now darkened and covered in rust, but with enough dexterity this weapon may still stand up to some use.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bandit's Curved Sword is a common Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Bandit's Curved Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Beastman's Curved Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword forged of dull iron wielded by the beastmen of Farum Azula. 
The blade is heavy but well-balanced. Comparatively easy to wield for the damage it delivers.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Beastman's Curved Sword is a uncommon Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Beastman's Curved Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Eclipse Shotel
weapons.flavorText:
Storied sword and treasure of Castle Sol that depicts an eclipsed sun drained of color. One of the legendary armaments. 
In Sol, the sight of an eclipse inspires a dreadful awe, preventing an onlooker from averting his gaze.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Eclipse Shotel is a legendary Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Eclipse Shotel comes with Death Flare Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Falchion
weapons.flavorText:
A curved sword with a single-sided blade. Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales.
 Wielders of the weapon employ a unique style that enhances attacks with spinning motions.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Falchion is a common Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Falchion comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Flowing Curved Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Legends speak of a master of the sword garbed in blue, and his curved blade that was patterned after flowing water.
Strong attack unleashes a series of strikes akin to a dance, offering a glimpse into the legend.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Flowing Curved Sword is a rare Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Flowing Curved Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Grossmesser
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword boasting a large blade. This weapon is designed to make use of its weight in combination with its sharp cutting edge.
A thoroughly reliable choice of weapon for those who can master its particulars.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Grossmesser is a uncommon Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Grossmesser comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Magma Blade
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword with a blade fashioned from the lava of Mt. Gelmir. An armament of the man-serpents, impossible for a human to have made.
 Deals fire damage.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Magma Blade is a rare Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Magma Blade comes with Magma Shower Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Mantis Blade
weapons.flavorText:
A curved sword with a blade at both ends wielded by the Cemetery Shades, the insect-ridden grave keepers. 
The blade is thin and sharp, and strong attack unleashes a far-reaching slash.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Mantis Blade is a uncommon Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
However, keep in mind that status ailment buildup, damage types that this weapon inflicts, as well as its attribute scaling can depend on its available Ash of War (Weapon Skill), which can be random due to the nature of the game.

weapons.name: Nox Flowing Sword
weapons.flavorText:
A grim weapon wielded by swordsmen of the Eternal City, this shotel has a blade as fine as a needle. 
Forged from the liquid metal of a Silver Tear, it is thoroughly tempered until hardened.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Nox Flowing Sword is a rare Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Nox Flowing Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Scavenger's Curved Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Unique curved sword, notched like shark's teeth. Weapon carried by corpse pillagers who prowl the sites of old battles.
The blade is tacky with blood and covered in hefty nicks, making it totally uneven. Life can be sinister indeed.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Scavenger's Curved Sword is a uncommon Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Scavenger's Curved Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Scimitar
weapons.flavorText:
A curved sword with a single-sided blade. 
Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales.
Smaller in size than most curved swords, it carves into enemies with quick, sharp cuts.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Scimitar is a common Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Scimitar comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Serpent-god's Curved Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword fashioned in the image of an ancient serpent deity and tool of a forgotten religion practiced on Mt. Gelmir.
Formerly used to offer up sacrifices
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Serpent-god's Curved Sword is a uncommon Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Serpent-god's Curved Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Shamshir
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword with a thin blade of ample length. Light of weight despite its larger size, its slicing attacks come in rapid succession. 
A devastatingly powerful weapon in the hands of a skilled swordsman.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Shamshir is a uncommon Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Shamshir comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Shotel
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword with a severely hooked blade. Its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard. 
Made to hunt down humans, this weapon requires high dexterity to wield efficiently.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Shotel is a common Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Shotel comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Wing Of Astel
weapons.flavorText:
Sword fashioned from a delicate wing, suffused with the magic of the stars. Strong attack unleashes a wave of enchanted light.
Crafted from a relic of the Naturalborn of the Void who is said to have assailed the Eternal City.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Wing Of Astel is a rare Curved Sword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Wing Of Astel comes with Nebula Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Beastman's Cleaver
weapons.flavorText:
Curved greatsword of colossal size forged of dull iron and wielded by the beastmen of Farum Azula. 
The blade is incredibly heavy, but well-balanced. Comparatively easy to wield for the damage it delivers. It's clear the beastmen possess knowledge beyond human ken.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Beastman's Cleaver is a uncommon Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Beastman's Cleaver comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bloodhound's Fang
weapons.flavorText:
Curved greatsword with a gently undulating blade wielded by Bloodhound Knights.
 A fearsome blade capable of brutal airborne attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bloodhound's Fang is a uncommon Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Bloodhound's Fang comes with Bloodhound's Finesse Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dismounter
weapons.flavorText:
This curved greatsword wielded by the brawny sellswords of Kaiden combines the blades of a scimitar with the heft of a hatchet.
A difficult to handle weapon that demands much of the wielder's strength and dexterity, but with practice and ability, it can serve as a versatile weapon even on horseback.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dismounter is a common Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Dismounter comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
weapons.flavorText:
Curved greatsword wielded by Magma Wyrms. The shape resembles a dragon's jaw and is covered in hard scales. 
It's said these land-bound dragons were once human heroes who partook in dragon communion, a grave transgression for which they were cursed to crawl the earth upon their bellies, shadows of their former selves.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Magma Wyrm's Scalesword is a rare Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Magma Wyrm's Scalesword comes with Magma Guillotine Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Monk's Flameblade
weapons.flavorText:
Curved sword with a flickering flame motif. Wielded by the Fire Monks who came from the Mountaintops of the Giants. 
The monks came to the land of Liurnia in pursuit of a fugitive who stole their fire.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Monk's Flameblade is a uncommon Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Monk's Flameblade comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Morgott's Cursed Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Warped blade of shifting hue used by Morgott, the Omen King. 
The accursed blood that Morgott recanted and sealed away reformed into this blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Morgott's Cursed Sword is a legendary Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Morgott's Cursed Sword comes with Cursed-blood Slice Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Omen Cleaver
weapons.flavorText:
Heavy-bladed curved sword of colossal size awarded to Omen as a tool of war. This weapon is made to take advantage of brute strength. 
The pattern etched upon the blade is the remnant of a deteriorating malediction. Indeed, when bestowing a weapon, preparations must be made for taking it away.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Omen Cleaver is a uncommon Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Omen Cleaver comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Onyx Lord's Greatsword
weapons.flavorText:
Greatsword forged from golden-hued meteoric ore. The blade conceals gravity-manipulating magic. 
A weapon unique to the Onyx Lords, a race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Onyx Lord's Greatsword is a rare Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Onyx Lord's Greatsword comes with Onyx Lord's Repulsion Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Zamor Curved Sword
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon wielded by the knights of Zamor who earned great renown during the War against the Giants. 
In apparent devotion to winter, the curved blade is styled after an icy wind and imbued with a powerful frost effect.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Zamor Curved Sword is a rare Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Frostbite buildup on hit.
Zamor Curved Sword comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dragonscale Blade
weapons.flavorText:
A weapon made by sharpening a Gravel Stone scale, thought to be the source of ancient dragon immortality, into an unclouded blade.
 Alas, the Dragonkin Soldiers never attained immortality, and perished as decrepit, pale imitations of their skyborn kin.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dragonscale Blade is a rare Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Dragonscale Blade comes with Ice Lightning Sword Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Hand Of Malenia
weapons.flavorText:
Blade built into Malenia's prosthetic arm. Through consecration it is resistant to rot. 
Malenia's war prosthesis symbolized her victories. Some claim to have seen wings when the weapon was raised aloft; wings of fierce determination that have never known defeat.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Hand Of Malenia is a legendary Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Hand Of Malenia comes with Waterfowl Dance Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Meteoric Ore Blade
weapons.flavorText:
Katana forged from meteoric ore to dispatch lifeforms born of falling stars. Deals magic damage. 
The blade is weighty, known to deliver slashes of such ferocity that the impact is said to resemble the crash of a falling meteor.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Meteoric Ore Blade is a uncommon Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Meteoric Ore Blade comes with Gravitas Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Moonveil
weapons.flavorText:
Katana forged of glintstone. Masterpiece of a Sellian swordsmith.
 
Light enwreathes the blade when sheathed, explaining its Moonveil moniker.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Moonveil is a rare Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Moonveil comes with Transient Moonlight Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Nagakiba
weapons.flavorText:
Katana with a ferociously long blade. Signature weapon of Yura, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
 Reminiscent of a reinforced spear, its imposing length can be put to good use with powerful thrusting attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Nagakiba is a uncommon Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Nagakiba comes with Unsheathe Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rivers Of Blood
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon of Okina, swordsman from the Land of Reeds. A cursed weapon that has felled countless men. 
When Mohg, the Lord of Blood, first felt Okina's sword, and madness, upon his flesh, he had a proposal, to offer Okina the life of a demon, whose thirst would never go unsated.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rivers Of Blood is a rare Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Rivers Of Blood comes with Corpse Piler Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Serpentbone Blade
weapons.flavorText:
Sinister katana modeled after a serpent bone. 
The densely packed row of spines that jut away from the cutting edge are coated in a lethal poison.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Serpentbone Blade is a uncommon Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Poison buildup on hit.
Serpentbone Blade comes with Double Slash Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Uchigatana
weapons.flavorText:
A katana with a long single-edged curved blade. A unique weapon wielded by the samurai from the Land of Reeds.
 The blade, with its undulating design, boasts extraordinary sharpness, and its slash attacks cause blood loss.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Uchigatana is a common Katana in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Uchigatana comes with Unsheathe Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Eleonora's Poleblade
weapons.flavorText:
Twinned naginata forged in the Land of Reeds. Chosen weapon of Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger. 
Her mastery of the sword was such that her onslaught was likened to a whirlwind, but now her legacy is stained by accursed blood.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Eleonora's Poleblade is a rare Twinblade in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Eleonora's Poleblade comes with Bloodblade Dance Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Black Blades
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze twinblade wielded by Valiant Gargoyles, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage.
 Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Black Blades is a rare Twinblade in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Black Blades comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Twinblade
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze twinblade wielded by Valiant Gargoyles. 
Just like the wielder, the missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Twinblade is a uncommon Twinblade in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Twinblade comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Godskin Peeler
weapons.flavorText:
Unique twinblade wielded by Godskin Apostles characterized by its disturbing design. One end features a sickle for slicing attacks while the other boasts a winding spike for boring into flesh.
 Much skill is required to wield this weapon due to its asymmetric nature.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Godskin Peeler is a uncommon Twinblade in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Godskin Peeler comes with Black Flame Tornado Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Twinblade
weapons.flavorText:
A sword with blades on both sides of the hilt. This weapon is difficult to wield and demands high dexterity.
 Can be wielded with a single hand, but its true strength is enabled with dual-handed spinning attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Twinblade is a common Twinblade in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Twinblade comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Twinned Knight Swords
weapons.flavorText:
An attractive twinblade of fine make that prizes the chivalric way. 
Can be wielded with a single hand, but its true strength is unlocked with dual-handed spinning attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Twinned Knight Swords is a uncommon Twinblade in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Twinned Knight Swords comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Battle Axe
weapons.flavorText:
A thick, heavy blade attached to a handle. A versatile, standard weapon. 
Capable of powerful attacks thanks to the weighty blade, these weapons are also regarded for their powerful charge attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Battle Axe is a common Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Battle Axe comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Celebrant's Cleaver
weapons.flavorText:
Cleaver decorated with many-colored fabrics. Ceremonial tool used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula, Windmill Village. 
Crafted from human bone.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Celebrant's Cleaver is a uncommon Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Celebrant's Cleaver comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Forked Hatchet
weapons.flavorText:
Peculiar hatchet wielded by imps. 
The gently undulating forked blade is known as an "imp's tongue" and causes blood loss.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Forked Hatchet is a common Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Forked Hatchet comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Hand Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Commonly known as a hatchet, this smaller variety of axe is an everyday work tool.
 Despite its short reach, it is easy to handle, exceling in successive attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Hand Axe is a common Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Hand Axe comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Highland Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Single-sided axe used by the warriors of the highlands. 
Brave combatants begin battle by crying out their names.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Highland Axe is a uncommon Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Highland Axe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Icerind Hatchet
weapons.flavorText:
A hatchet with a frost-coated blade. One of several gifts given by Castle Sol in the distant north. 
Known as "freezing fog," the blade is thought to be a dragon's scale. Inflicts a powerful frost effect.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Icerind Hatchet is a rare Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it has innate Frostbite buildup on hit.
Icerind Hatchet comes with Hoarfrost Stomp Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Iron Cleaver
weapons.flavorText:
Fairly large iron cleaver, commonly used by the maltreated Misbegotten.
 Steeped in resentment, these weapons are swung wildly and relentlessly, often after rushing up to foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Iron Cleaver is a uncommon Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Iron Cleaver comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Jawbone Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Axe made from a herbivore's skull. Weapon of the ancestral followers who disdain metal. 
This axe is more of a bludgeon; it forgoes a bladed edge, instead using the beast's molar teeth to buffet foes, dealing strike damage.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Jawbone Axe is a common Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Jawbone Axe comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ripple Blade
weapons.flavorText:
Unique weapon wielded by young Albinaurics, this sword is modelled after the ripples that are thought to be the origin of their species.
Its attack power is greatly enhanced with one's arcane attribute.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ripple Blade is a uncommon Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ripple Blade comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rosus' Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Usher of Death, Rosus, who shows the path to the catacombs throughout the Lands Between, is depicted on this ritual axe. 
The dead easily lose their way, and have always been in sore need of a guiding hand.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rosus' Axe is a rare Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Rosus' Axe comes with Rosus's Summons Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Sacrificial Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Hatchet used in ancient sacrificial rite. A Deathbird is depicted as a malevolent deity.
The power of the rite yet lingers.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Sacrificial Axe is a rare Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Sacrificial Axe comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Stormhawk Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Battle axe designed to resemble a hawk, with its wings comprising the blade. Signature weapon of warriors who strive to remain one with the storm, despite being so far from their place of birth. 
Their hearts are proud, and thereby easily undone.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Stormhawk Axe is a rare Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
