spells.effectDescription: Creates claws that tear through the land.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
Creates beast claws that rend the land with shockwaves.
Charging enhances potency.
This incantation represents the fury of Gurranq, his bestial nature returned, as much as it does his restless agitation.

spells.name: Gurranq's Beast Claw
spells.effectDescription: Creates beast claws to rend surroundings with shockwaves.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
Creates beast claws that rend surroundings with shockwaves.
Long ago, Gurranq was a beast of such terrifying ferocity that his former name meant "Death of the Demigods."

spells.name: Bestial Sling
spells.effectDescription: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards
spells.flavorText:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can 
be cast without delay after performing another action.
It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first 
weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.

spells.name: Stone Of Gurranq
spells.effectDescription: Hurls a boulder before the caster.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
Hurls a boulder before the caster. This incantation can be cast 
repeatedly.
Long ago, Gurranq was a beast of such terrifying ferocity that his
 former name meant "Death of the Demigods."

spells.name: Bestial Vitality
spells.effectDescription: Heals HP over a period of time.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
Fills the body with bestial vigor, restoring HP over a period of time.
Having gained intelligence, the beasts must have felt how their 
wildness slipped away as civilization took hold.

spells.name: Swarm Of Flies
spells.effectDescription: Releases a swarm of bloodflies before caster.
spells.flavorText:
A Blood Oath incantation, shared from the Lord of Blood's power.
Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster to assault foes. The vile swarm deals damage and builds up onset of blood loss. This incantation can be cast while in motion.
The new palace of the Lord of Blood lies in a swamp of festering blood, and these flies are said to spawn from excrement in that land.

spells.name: Bloodflame Talons
spells.effectDescription: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode.
spells.flavorText:
A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
Creates bloodflame lacerations before the caster, which explode in an instant.
This incantation can be cast repeatedly.
After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.

spells.name: Bloodboon
spells.effectDescription: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.
spells.flavorText:
Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood.
Thrust arm into the body of the Formless Mother, then scatter the bloodflame to set the area ablaze.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.
The mother of truth craves wounds. When Mohg stood before her, deep underground, his accursed blood erupted with fire, and besotted with the defilement that he was born into.

spells.name: Bloodflame Blade
spells.effectDescription: Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame.
spells.flavorText:
A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
Engulfs armament held in the right hand with bloodflame.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.
After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.

spells.name: Poison Mist
spells.effectDescription: Releases poison mist before caster.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation of the servants of rot.
Releases a poisonous mist before the caster. This incantation can 
be cast while in motion.
Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death 
that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the 
cycle of rebirth put into practice.

spells.name: Poison Armament
spells.effectDescription: Enchants right-hand armament with poison.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation of the servants of rot.
Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison. This 
incantation can be cast while in motion.
Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death 
that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the 
cycle of rebirth put into practice.

spells.name: Pest Threads
spells.effectDescription: Launches countless sticky threads before caster.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation of the servants of rot.
Secretes countless sticky threads, launching them forwards.
A technique of the pale pests who crawl through the lands afflicted
 by scarlet rot; the abandoned children of the goddess.
"Do you have an interest in rot incantations?"

spells.name: Scarlet Aeonia
spells.effectDescription: Creates a giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot.
spells.flavorText:
Technique of Malenia, the Goddess of Rot.
Creates a gigantic flower that blooms into an explosion of scarlet
 rot.
Each time the scarlet flower blooms, Malenia's rot advances. It has
bloomed twice already. With the third bloom, she will become a 
true goddess.

spells.name: The Flame Of Frenzy
spells.effectDescription: Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to burst forth from the caster's eyes.
Charging increases the range of the burst.
The flame of frenzy deals damage and causes buildup of madness. This incantation also causes buildup of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.

spells.name: Unendurable Frenzy
spells.effectDescription: Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to violently burst forth from the 
caster's eyes. Hold to continue channeling the flame. This 
incantation can be used while in motion.
It is the maddening pain and unstoppable tears of those afflicted 
with the flame of frenzy brought into being.

spells.name: Frenzied Burst
spells.effectDescription: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.
spells.flavorText:
Incantations originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
Releases concentrated blasts of the yellow flame of frenzy from the 
caster's eyes. Charging enhances potency, enabling the blasts to 
penetrate the enemy's guard.
In times past, every single person who attempted to control the 
flame of frenzy succumbed to madness after a desperate internal 
struggle. This incantation is testament to a meager victory.

spells.name: Howl Of Shabriri
spells.effectDescription: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes.
spells.flavorText:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
Releases a maddening shriek that causes madness buildup in foes
 nearby. This incantation also causes madness buildup in the caster 
and makes enemies more likely to target them.
It is said that the sickness of the flame of frenzy began with 
Shabriri, the most reviled man in all history.

spells.name: Dragonfire
spells.effectDescription: Channels dragon to spew flame breath.
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath. Charging extends duration.
Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.

spells.name: Agheel's Flame
spells.effectDescription: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath from 
above. Charging extends duration. This incantation can be used 
while jumping.
The dead gazed at the skies over the lakes of Limgrave, praying 
that the dragons' flames would burn them to ash.

spells.name: Magma Breath
spells.effectDescription: Channels wyrm to spew magma breath
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a wyrm to spew magma breath.
Allows one follow-up attack.
Those who have performed the Dragon Communion will find 
their humanity slowly slipping away. Once they fully succumb to 
their fate, they are left no more than wyrms that crawl the earth.

spells.name: Theodorix's Magma
spells.effectDescription: Spews magma breath of Theodorix from above.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power
 of the great wyrm Theodorix.
Transforms caster into a great wyrm to spew a large volume of 
magma breath. Allows one follow-up attack.
The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on  as a 
hero of the War against the Giants.

spells.name: Glintstone Breath
spells.effectDescription: Channels dragon to spew magic breath.
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew magic breath.
Charging extends duration.
Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate Dragon Communion are called the dragon-hearted.

spells.name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
spells.effectDescription: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power 
of Smarag, the Glintstone Dragon.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew magic breath from above.
Charging extends duration. This incantation can be used while jumping.
Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.

spells.name: Rotten Breath
spells.effectDescription: Channels dragon to spew scarlet rot breath.
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew scarlet rot breath.
Charging extends duration.
Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate Dragon 
Communion are called the dragon-hearted.

spells.name: Ekzykes's Decay
spells.effectDescription: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power 
of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew scarlet rot breath from
above. Charging extends duration. This incantation can be cast while jumping.
Ekzykes, Dragon Communion Revenger, did not forget his hatred
 even as he succumbed to the scarlet rot.

spells.name: Dragonice
spells.effectDescription: Channels dragon to spew icy breath.
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew icy breath.
Charging extends duration.
Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate Dragon
 Communion are called the dragon-hearted.

spells.name: Borealis's Mist
spells.effectDescription: Spews icy breath of Borealis from above.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power 
of Borealis, the Freezing Fog.
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew icy breath from above.
Charging extends the duration. This incantation can be cast while jumping.
The ice dragons were once lords of the mountaintops long ago,
 until they were defeated by the Fire Giants and chased from the 
peak.

spells.name: Placidusax's Ruin
spells.effectDescription: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax.
spells.flavorText:
Power gleaned form the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax. 
Transforms caster into the Dragonlord to spew golden breath from above.
This incantation can be cast while jumping.
These are the dying wails of the Dragonlord who once dwelled
 eternal beyond time.

spells.name: Dragonclaw
spells.effectDescription: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws.
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a dragon to tear through foes with dragon claws. Allows one follow-up attack.
Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. This is a pure and overwhelming power.

spells.name: Dragonmaw
spells.effectDescription: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster.
spells.flavorText:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
Transforms caster into a dragon to bite enemies before them.
Incantations of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.

spells.name: Greyoll's Roar
spells.effectDescription: Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll.
spells.flavorText:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power
 of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon. An incantation of legendary status.
Transforms caster into a dragon to emit a terrible roar, reducing 
the attack power and defense of nearby enemies.
Greyoll was the mother of all dragons, dwarfing all who stood 
before her like a looming mountain.

ashesOfWar.name: Alabaster Lord's Pull
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.Has a greater area of effect than Gravitas.

ashesOfWar.name: Ancient Lightning Spear
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, then throw it as a spear.Can be charged to increase its power.

ashesOfWar.name: Angel's Wings
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Jump and imbue the wing-blade of the armament with light, then deliver a slashing attack on the enemy.The white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.

ashesOfWar.name: Assassin's Gambit
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound.Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium straight swords and thrusting swords

ashesOfWar.name: Barbaric Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding daggers, thrusting swords, and whips)

ashesOfWar.name: Barrage
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery Skill using a bow held horizontally.Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

ashesOfWar.name: Barricade Shield
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill made famous by Sir Neidhart.Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.

ashesOfWar.name: Bear Witness
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Grant the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.

ashesOfWar.name: Beast's Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-traveling projectile.

ashesOfWar.name: Black Flame Tornado
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames.Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

ashesOfWar.name: Blade Of Death
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Unleash the power of the Rune of Death to fire off a blade-like projectile.In addition to dealing immediate damage, the blade reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Blade Of Gold
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Leap into the air, charging the armament with golden flames that are then shot at the enemy as a single, blade-like projectile.Inflicts holy damage.

ashesOfWar.name: Blood Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging.Can be fired in rapid succession.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium swords

ashesOfWar.name: Blood Tax
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with armaments capable of thrusting (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodblade Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Leap at foe to perform a flurry of tornado-like attacks.Follow up with an additional input to perform an attack that ends in an evasive maneuver.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodboon Ritual
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother. Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodhound's Finesse
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes.Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodhound's Step
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep.This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloody Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

ashesOfWar.name: Braggart's Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Declare your presence with a boastful roar.Raises attack power, defense and stamina recover speed.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding daggers, thrusting swords, and whips)

ashesOfWar.name: Bubble Shower
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow on the horn to release a spume of magic bubbles.The bubbles float gently before raining down on the target.

ashesOfWar.name: Buckler Parry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.This is faster than a regular parry.

ashesOfWar.name: Carian Grandeur
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill.Transform blade into magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.

ashesOfWar.name: Carian Greatsword
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill.Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.

ashesOfWar.name: Carian Retaliation
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades.Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium shields

ashesOfWar.name: Charge Forth
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with polearms capable of thrusting, heavy thrusting swords, and twinblades

ashesOfWar.name: Chilling Mist
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards.The armament retains its frost for a while.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding whips, fists, and claws)

ashesOfWar.name: Claw Flick
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Cause the finger to swell, then flex to build up strength before giving enemies an almighty flick.

ashesOfWar.name: Contagious Fury
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Incite the jellyfish's wrath and allow its fury to flow through you.Raises attack power for a certain duration.

ashesOfWar.name: Corpse Piler
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks.Follow up with an additional input for further successive attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Corpse Wax Cutter
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Lost skill of ancient heroes.Lift the sword up high to release the power of corpse wax and launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

ashesOfWar.name: Cragblade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that manipulates gravity.Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.

ashesOfWar.name: Cursed-blood Slice
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace, then charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice. The bloody trail of the late is followed by a burst of flame.Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Death Flare
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Set the lusterless sun ablaze with the Prince of Death's flames, inflicting the death ailment upon foes.Follow up with an additional input to bring down the armament, triggering an explosion.

ashesOfWar.name: Destined Death
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Set free the remnants of Destined Death, plunging the greatsword into the ground to summon a myriad of blades.In addition to dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a short time.

ashesOfWar.name: Determination
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: A knightly skill.Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Devourer Of Worlds
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Charge the scepter with magic and strike it against the ground to steal the HP of all nearby enemies.

ashesOfWar.name: Double Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skills of superior swordsmen.Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords and polearms capable of slashing (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Dynast's Finesse
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Nimbly avoid an attack, securing some distance from foes.Follow up with strong attack to perform a sudden lunge, and press strong attack again to perform a sweeping slice.

ashesOfWar.name: Earthshaker
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave.Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with greataxes, great hammers, great spears, and colossal weapons

ashesOfWar.name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning.Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

ashesOfWar.name: Enchanted Shot
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence.The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.

ashesOfWar.name: Endure
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise.Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

ashesOfWar.name: Erdtree Slam
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Jump high up into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.This is the most powerful of all the Ground Slam skills.

ashesOfWar.name: Eruption
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the knights who serve at Volcano Manor.Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with large and colossal swords, axes, and hammers

ashesOfWar.name: Establish Order
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the armament in a salute, releasing a golden explosion.Repeated inputs send out waves of golden light.

ashesOfWar.name: Familial Rancor
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Gently rattle the copper heads to summon vengeful spirits that chase down foes.The anguish of a spouse and children invites accursed wrath.

ashesOfWar.name: Flame Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.

ashesOfWar.name: Flame Of The Redmanes
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn.Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

ashesOfWar.name: Flame Spit
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Ready the shield, then launch a fireball from the barrel.The fireball explodes on impact.

ashesOfWar.name: Flaming Strike
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc.Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding colossal weapons and whips)

ashesOfWar.name: Flowing Form (Nox Flowing Sword)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.Swing the armament like a whip to perform a sweeping slice over a wide area.

ashesOfWar.name: Flowing Form (Nox Flowing Hammer)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.Swing the armament like a whip to strike surroundings before slamming its teardrop-shaped head down.

ashesOfWar.name: Frenzyflame Thrust
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the spear with the flame of frenzy and leap forwards, plunging it into the ground and setting off a maddening explosion.The skill inflicts both the enemy and the user with madness.

ashesOfWar.name: Ghostflame Ignition
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust out the barbed rod and set its tip alight with ghostflame.Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.

ashesOfWar.name: Giant Hunt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes.Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with large and colossal weapons capable of thrusting, spears, and twinblades

ashesOfWar.name: Glintstone Dart
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that builds from the Glintstone Pebble sorcery.Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

ashesOfWar.name: Gold Breaker
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Leap up high and, while suspended in midair, imbue the rune shard with light before smashing it down hard onto the ground.The heroic Radagon's signature attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Land
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts.Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with greataxes, great hammers, great spears, and colossal weapons

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Parry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance.Effective even at a slight distance.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium shields

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Retaliation
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Slam
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees.Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Tempering
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence.While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Vow (skill)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital.Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

ashesOfWar.name: Gravitas
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill originating from the Alabaster Lords, who had skin of stone.Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding small armaments and whips)

ashesOfWar.name: Gravity Bolt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the jaw of fallingstar beast with gravitational lightning, sending a bolt crashing down a short distance away.Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Great-serpent Hunt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Perform a powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward thrust via additional input.When fightning a great serpent, a long blade of light will appear, revealing the armament's true power.

ashesOfWar.name: Great Oracular Bubble
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble.The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

ashesOfWar.name: Ground Slam
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

ashesOfWar.name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave.Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.

ashesOfWar.name: Hoarfrost Stomp
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground.The mist applies the frost status effect.

ashesOfWar.name: Holy Ground
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it.

ashesOfWar.name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Repeatedly smash the Axe of Godrick into the ground, unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave

ashesOfWar.name: Ice Lightning Sword
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Call down a bolt of ice lightning into the blade and bring it down upon a foe.The ice lightning effect will persist for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Ice Spear
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni.Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with polearms capable of thrusting and twinblades

ashesOfWar.name: Impaling Thrust
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a long thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with armaments capable of thrusting (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Kick
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance.Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.

ashesOfWar.name: Knowledge Above All
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the scepter to manifest the realm of the All-Knowing.Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all within the area, including the caster.

ashesOfWar.name: Last Rites
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the epitaph to grant the effect of Sacred Order to yourselfand allies in the vicinity.Particularly effective at laying to rest Those Who Live in Death.

ashesOfWar.name: Lifesteal Fist
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

ashesOfWar.name: Lightning Ram
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill inspired by tumbling rams.Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Lightning Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock.The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords, axes, and hammers

ashesOfWar.name: Lion's Claw
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside the General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords, axes, and hammers (excluding small armaments and thrusting swords)

ashesOfWar.name: Loretta's Slash (1)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight.Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glinstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Loretta's Slash (2)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight.Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Magma Guillotine
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Grab the scalesword with both hands, as a wyrm would hold it in its mouth, and leap forwards, smashing it into the ground and triggering a blast of magma.Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Magma Shower
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slash at foes in a twirling motion while scattering magma all around.Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Mighty Shot
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from an oblique stance.Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

ashesOfWar.name: Miquella's Ring Of Light
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Summon Miquella's shining halo and fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Mists Of Slumber
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area.This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Moonlight Greatsword
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the sword aloft, bathing it in the light of the dark moon.Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with frost.Charged attacks release blasts of moonlight.

ashesOfWar.name: Nebula
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic to perform a sweeping strike.
This attack leaves a dark cloud of stars in its wake that lingers briefly before exploding.

ashesOfWar.name: Night-and-flame Stance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hold the sword level and prepare to cast a sorcery.Follow up with a normal attack to cast the Night Comet sorcery, or a strong attack to sweep forward with a burst of flames.

ashesOfWar.name: Oath Of Vengeance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swear an oath upon the greatsword to avenge the clan, temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration.While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.

ashesOfWar.name: Onyx Lord's Repulsion
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack sends enemies flying away.

ashesOfWar.name: Oracular Bubble
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow on the horn to release a magic bubble.The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

ashesOfWar.name: Ordovis's Vortex
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground.This skill can be charged to increase its power.

ashesOfWar.name: Parry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with daggers, curved swords, thrusting swords, fists, claws, and small and medium shields

ashesOfWar.name: Piercing Fang
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with medium and large armaments capable of thrusting

ashesOfWar.name: Phantom Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry.Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with polearms and twinblades (great spears )

ashesOfWar.name: Poisonous Mist
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards.The armament retain its poison for a while.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding whips, fists, and claws)

ashesOfWar.name: Poison Moth Flight
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slash with a poison-infused blade.If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium swords (excluding twinblades)

ashesOfWar.name: Prayerful Strike
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground.This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

ashesOfWar.name: Prelate's Charge
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in.Hold to continue the charge.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with large and colossal axes and hammers

ashesOfWar.name: Quickstep
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot.Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

ashesOfWar.name: Radahn's Rain
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from a low stance.Ready the bow and fire a sudden flurry of arrows up into the sky.The arrows will pour on foes like rain.

ashesOfWar.name: Rain Of Arrows
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from a low stance.Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles.

ashesOfWar.name: Rallying Standard
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hoist the war banner aloft and give a rallying command.Raises attack power and defense for self and nearby allies.

ashesOfWar.name: Raptor Of The Mists
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing.If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.

ashesOfWar.name: Reduvia Blood Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloostains into airborne blood blades that cause blood loss.Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Regal Beastclaw
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam the hammer into the ground, rending the land asunder with the armament's five bestial claws.

ashesOfWar.name: Regal Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Let loose a mighty war cry, raising attack power, while sending out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against by stomping the ground. While active, strong attack becomes a lunging slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Repeating Thrust
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with armaments capable of thrusting (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Rosus's Summons
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the axe aloft to summon those lost in death.Three skeletons will appear at a distance and attack in tandem before vanishing.

ashesOfWar.name: Royal Knight's Resolve
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord.Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Ruinous Ghostflame
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing the sword to bathe its blade in ghostflame.The ghostflame adds magic damage to attacks, and also has a bitterly cold bite.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile.The armament retains its holy essence for awhile.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding whips, fists, and claws)

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Order
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights.Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Phalanx
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Release the power of a hidden incantation to erect a palisade of golden spears frontwards.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Ring Of Light
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights.Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, and then fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Sea Of Magma
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing a molten whip overhead to temporarily cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma.Hold to continue swinging the lava whip.

ashesOfWar.name: Seppuku
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds.Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (excluding small and colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Shared Order
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights.Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

ashesOfWar.name: Shield Bash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance.Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

ashesOfWar.name: Shield Crash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered.Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.

ashesOfWar.name: Shriek Of Milos
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Lets out a horrific cursed scream that reduces all damage negation and status resistances for nearby foes.While active, strong attacks will change to a combo attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Siluria's Woe
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the treespear in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind.Charged attacks have the power to blow away enemies and can fire the tornado forwards.

ashesOfWar.name: Sorcery Of The Crozier
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing floating magic projectiles that chase enemies automatically.

ashesOfWar.name: Soul Stifler
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the greathorn's wings to summon a soul-sapping miasma.Enemies in the affected area will temporarily suffer from reduced damage negation.

ashesOfWar.name: Spearcall Ritual
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the spear high, bearing prayers into the sky to summon a downpour of spectral spears.

ashesOfWar.name: Spectral Lance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights.Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Chain
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack.Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successive attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Slash (1)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill favored by dexterous warriors.Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords, axes, and polearms (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Slash (2)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill favored by dexterous warriors.Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Strikes
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack.Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Weapon
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses.Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium swords, axes, and hammers, as well as polearms and staves (excluding great spears)

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Wheel
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed.Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while walking to push the armament into enemies.

ashesOfWar.name: Square Off
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: This skill starts with the sword held level.Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.

ashesOfWar.name: Stamp (sweep)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords, axes, and hammers (excluding small and medium swords)

ashesOfWar.name: Stamp (upward Cut)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords, axes, and hammers (excluding small and medium swords)

ashesOfWar.name: Starcaller Cry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Bring the two swords together and roar into the skies, pulling in enemies with a gravitational wave.Follow up with an additional input to slam down with gravity-infused swords.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Assault
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with polearms capable of thrusting, heavy thrusting swords, and twinblades

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Lost skill of Stormveil.Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords (excluding colossal weapons and twinblades)

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Kick
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the prosthetic leg blade into the ground, creating a storm.Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lightning-infused jumping attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Stomp
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Wall
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles.Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium shields

ashesOfWar.name: Stormcaller
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords capable of slashing, axes, hammers, and polearms (excluding small and colossal weapons )

ashesOfWar.name: Sky Shot
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from a low stance.Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from above when it comes down.

ashesOfWar.name: Surge Of Faith
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Set the flames of Birac's faith ablaze in the cranial vessel, thenraise it aloft to rain down fireballs in all directions.Repeated inputs will continue to raise the armament aloft, continuing the attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Sword Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords, axes, and polearms capable of slashing (excluding colossal weapons and great spears )

ashesOfWar.name: Taker's Flames
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the sacred sword aloft to set it ablaze with blasphemous flames, then bring it down to fire off a forward blast.The flames steal HP from those they touch.

ashesOfWar.name: The Queen's Black Flame
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Set the blade ablaze with the god-slaying black flame before delivering a sweeping slash.Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. The black flames will continue to wear down HP for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Thops's Barrier
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations.Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with small and medium shields

ashesOfWar.name: Through And Through
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance.Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

ashesOfWar.name: Thunderbolt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult.Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Thundercloud Form
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Temporarily transform into a red thundercloud and fly through the air, then plunge down with a lightning-infused blade.Hold to increase the reach of the thundercloud form.

ashesOfWar.name: Thunderstorm
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm. Follow up with an additional input to perform up to two spinning attacks.The lightning will stay on the blade for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Tongues Of Fire
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Ready the shield, then spray violent jets of fire from the tongues protruding from its maw.Hold to continue spraying fire. This skill can be used while walking.

ashesOfWar.name: Transient Moonlight
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.Follow up with either a normal or a strong attack to draw the blade at great speed for an instant slash attack. Both attacks fire off a wave of light.

ashesOfWar.name: Troll's Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Look into the distance and let out an intense roar, generating a powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes.Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with large and colossal swords, axes, and hammers

ashesOfWar.name: Unblockable Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Imbue the cipher blade with light, extending its length, then strike with a sudden sweeping attack.
This attack cannot be blocked.

ashesOfWar.name: Unsheathe
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds.Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Vacuum Slice
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Lost skill of ancient heroes.Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearin vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords and axes (excluding colossal axes)

ashesOfWar.name: Viper Bite
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Give the shield a quick shake to temporarily bring the bronze viper to life, inciting it to lash out and bite foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Vow Of The Indomitable
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree.Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.

ashesOfWar.name: War Cry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with melee armaments (excluding daggers, thrusting swords, and whips)

ashesOfWar.name: Waterfowl Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo.Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Wave Of Gold
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the sword with bygone golden glory, then fire it at foes.A wide, golden wave fans out forwards, sweeping through all enemies caught in its path.

ashesOfWar.name: Waves Of Darkness
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness.Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with greataxes, great hammers, great spears, and colossal weapons

ashesOfWar.name: Wave Of Destruction
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the sword up high, then strike it against the ground to fire off a wave of gravitational force.

ashesOfWar.name: Wild Strikes
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing armament with wild abandon.Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with axes and hammers as well as curved swords and greatswords (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: White Shadow's Lure
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow.The apparition lures in foes of human build, drawing their aggression. Effective regardless of combat state.

ashesOfWar.name: Wolf's Assault
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Infuse the greatsword with frost, then perform a forward somersault to plunge it into the ground. Then, pull it out to release a cold blast.

ashesOfWar.name: Zamor Ice Storm (skill)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Plunge the curved sword into the ground, building power before unleashing a freezing storm that batters the surroundings.

ashesOfWar.name: Firebreather
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc.The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.

ashesOfWar.name: Fires of Slumber
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow into the candlestick's flame, creating a stream of hazy purplefire to cover the ground ahead.The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Glintblade Phalanx (Skill)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family.Form an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Glintstone Pebble (Skill)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name.Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.
ashesOfWar.usabilityDescription: Usable with swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (excluding colossal weapons)

ashesOfWar.name: Magic Dagger
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slash with magic-enwreathed blade.The magic coating lasts for some time.

ashesOfWar.name: Torch Attack
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust torch forward to set foes ablaze.This skill is specially effective against foes who are weak to fire.

talismans.name: Crimson Amber Medallion
talismans.flavorText:
A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. 
Boosts maximum HP. 
The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey,the first Elden Lord 
A primordial life energy resides inside.

talismans.name: Crimson Seed Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A crimson-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. 
Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears. 
The Erdtree was once perfect and eternal, and thus was it believed that Erdtree seeds could not exist.

talismans.name: Blessed Dew Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a drop of the Erdtree's sap, a blessed boon.
 Gradually restores HP. 
It was once thought that the blessed sap of the Erdtree would drip from its boughs forever  but that age of plenty swiftly came to a close, and with time, the Erdtree became more an object of faith.

talismans.name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
talismans.flavorText:
A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid.
Boosts maximum FP. 
The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
A primordial life energy resides inside.

talismans.name: Viridian Amber Medallion
talismans.flavorText:
A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. 
Boosts maximum stamina. 
The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. 
A primordial life energy resides inside.

talismans.name: Green Turtle Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman in the shape of a green turtle. 
Raises stamina recovery speed. 
Turtles are known as a nutritious ingredient, symbolic of inexhaustible power. 
However, those who hold turtles to be wise creatures consider the practice of eating their meat to be barbarous.

talismans.name: Erdtree's Favor
talismans.effectDescription: Increased Maximum HP +7%, Increased Maximum Stamina +7%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtrec. 
Slightly raises maximum HP and stamina. 
It is said that when the Age of the Erdtree began, such blessings were personally bestowed upon their recipients by Queen Marika herself.

talismans.name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Wrought iron talisman depicting an ancient dragon. 
Boosts physical damage negation. 
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

talismans.name: Spelldrake Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. 
Boosts magic damage negation. 
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

talismans.name: Flamedrake Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a red ancient dragon. 
Boosts fire damage negation. 
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

talismans.name: Boltdrake Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon
 Boosts lightning damage negation. 
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape e of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

talismans.name: Haligdrake Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a golden ancient dragon. 
Boosts holy damage negation. 
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

talismans.name: Pearldrake Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon. 
Boosts nonphysical damage negation. 
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic ofall manner of protections.

talismans.name: Immunizing Horn Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Poison Resistance +75, Improved Rot Resistance +75
talismans.flavorText:
An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. 
Raises immunity. (Immunity governs resistance to poison and rot.) 
Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

talismans.name: Stalwart Horn Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Blood Loss Resistance +75, Improved Frost Resistance +75
talismans.flavorText:
An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. 
Raises robustness. (Robustness governs resistance to blood loss and frost.) 
Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

talismans.name: Clarifying Horn Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Sleep Resistance +75, Improved Madness Resistance +75
talismans.flavorText:
An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. 
Raises focus. (Focus governs resistance to sleep and madness.) 
Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

talismans.name: Mottled Necklace
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Poison & Rot Resistance +40, Improved Blood Loss & Frost Resistance +40, Improved Sleep & Madness Resistance +40
talismans.flavorText:
A vividly-colored accoutrement precious to the ancestral followers. 
Raises immunity, robustness, and focus. 
Said to be a budding born. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a longlived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

talismans.name: Prince of Deaths Pustule
talismans.flavorText:
A fetid pustule taken from facial flesh. 
Raises vitality. (Vitality governs resistance to the effects of Death.)
 It is said that this pustule came from the visage of the Prince of Death, he who used to be called Godwyn. As First Dead of the demigods, it's said he's buried deep under the capital, at the Erdtree's roots.

talismans.name: Dagger Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a dagger and a surgeon. 
Enhances critical hits. 
The white-garbed field surgeons come to the aid of friend and foe alike by dealing a final deadly thrust to spare them from the prolonged agony of a mortal wound. A sense of mercy is a catalyst for bloodlust..

talismans.name: Curved Sword Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a curved sword and a swordsman. 
Enhances guard counters. 
It is said that a blind swordsman was the originator of this technique - the art of allowing one' s opponent to strike so as to leave them vulnerable to a well-timed reply.

talismans.name: Twinblade Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a twinblade and a confessor. 
Enhances the final hit ending a chain of attacks. 
The twinblade technique is a tradition of the confessors, who closely guard the secret of how they preserve the momentum of their attacks. Thus is the final strike of their onslaught all the more deadly.

talismans.name: Axe Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting an axe and a warrior
 Enhances charge attacks.
The Lord who led the Long March bore an axe, and his loyal warriors honored him by wielding axes of their own, making them very effective at dealing decisive blows.

talismans.name: Hammer Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a hammer and a knight. 
Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against a blocking opponent. 
Hammers are highly effective against shield-bearing foes, so much so that they are known as "knight-killers."

talismans.name: Spear Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a spear and a soldier. 
Enhances the counterattacks that are unique to thrusting weapons. 
Spears are standard weapons for soldiers in the Lands Between. They made it possible to respond to a ferocious foe with an equally ferocious counterattack.

talismans.name: Claw Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a claw and an assassin. 
Enhances jump attacks. 
The assassins of Ravenmount are killers by trade. They assail their victims while dressed as birds of prey

talismans.name: Greatshield Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
Talisman depicting a knight holding a greatshield. 
Boosts guarding ability. 
The knights of Leyndell once modelled themselves after the Tree Sentinels. Their purpose is to protect that which deserves protection, and thus the shield always comes before the sword.

talismans.name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting three iron arrows. 
Carried by soldiers long ago. Raises attack power of arrows and bolts.

talismans.name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting three arrows. Carried by hunters of beasts.
 Increases the effective range of bows.

talismans.name: Graven-School Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a school of graven mages, the nightmare of the academy. 
Raises potency of sorceries. 
The primeval current is a forbidden tradition of glintstone sorcery. To those who cleave to its teachings, the act of collecting sorcerers to fashion them into the seeds of stars is but another path of scientific inquiry.

talismans.name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman bearing an icon that depicts a group of masked figures. 
Raises potency of incantations. 
The figures represent the flock at prayer, their firm belief in the intangible inspiring even the solitary founder of their religion. 
What is faith if not an affirmation?

talismans.name: Primal Glintstone Blade
talismans.effectDescription: Reduced Spell FP Cost -25%, Maximum HP Down -15%
talismans.flavorText:
An old glintstone blade that has been stained with blood. 
Reduces PP consumption of sorceries and incantations at the cost of maximum HP. 
The old sorcerers would slice open their hearts with these blades to imbue a primal glintstone with their soul, and thus did they die.

talismans.name: Old Lord's Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A legendary talisman depicting the ancient king whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time. 
Extends the duration of sorceries and incantations. 
It is said that the ancient royal city of Farum Azula has been slowly crumbling since time immemorial.

talismans.name: Radagon Icon
talismans.flavorText:
A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Radagon. 
Shortens the casting time of sorceries and incantations. 
As the husband of Rennala of Caria, the red-haired Radagon studied sorcery, and as the husband of Queen Marika, he studied incantations. Thus did the hero aspire to be complete.

talismans.name: Roar Medallion
talismans.flavorText:
A bronze medallion depicting a roaring giant.
 Enhances roars and breath attacks. 
In ancient times, the giants were mortal enemies of the Erdtree. Their bellowing roars desolated nature, triggered avalanches, and whipped up storms of flame.

talismans.name: Companion Jar
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman given by the jars to their friends. 
Raises potency of thrown jars. 
Though the jars are brought to life by human flesh and blood, they are all rather kindly folk Perhaps they were made to be better than their innards.

talismans.name: Perfumer's Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a set of perfume bottles. 
Raises potency of arts employing perfume. 
There are gardens known only to the perfumers. Whether hidden on the fringes of the highlands, or obscured by shadows inside caves, the flowers blossom in secret, waiting to impart their scent.

talismans.name: Carian Filigreed Crest
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman adorned with the royal crest. 
Lowers FP consumed by skills. 
An honor said to have once been awarded to Carian knights who served as direct retainers to the kingdom's princesses. Now there is only one princess: Ranni, daughter of Rennala.

talismans.name: Warrior Jar Shard
talismans.flavorText:
Shard of a shattered warrior jar. 
Boosts the attack power of skills. 
Scraps of stewed flesh cling to the shard, and tatters of ornaments can be seen mingled within the slime. Relics of ancient royal warriors, perhaps.

talismans.name: Godfrey Icon
talismans.flavorText:
A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Godfrey. 
Raises charge attack power of sorceries, incantations, and skills. 
Godfrey was a ferocious warrior. When he vowed to become a lord, he took the Beast Regent Serosh upon his back to suppress the ceaseless lust for battle that raged within.

talismans.name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting the horns of a bull-goat
 Raises poise. 
Bull-goats are associated with the stout and mighty Tragoth, said to be unflinching in combat now a silent comrade to those who fight:

talismans.name: Magic Scorpion Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Magic Attack Power +15%, Impaired Physical Damage Negation -3%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that shimmers with magic. 
Raises magic attack power, but lowers damage negation.

talismans.name: Fire Scorpion Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Fire Attack Power +15%, Impaired Physical Damage Negation -3%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that burns with fire. 
Raises fire attack power, but lowers damage negation.

talismans.name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Lightning Attack Power +15%, Impaired Physical Damage Negation -3%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that sparks with lightning. 
Raises lightning attack power, but lowers damage negation.

talismans.name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Holy Attack Power +15%, Impaired Physical Damage Negation -3%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart with a blessed glow. 
Raises holy attack power, but lowers damage negation.

talismans.name: Crucible Feather Talisman
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman fashioned from feathers that embody the aspects of various creatures. Said to have grown on the human body long ago.
 Improves the effectiveness of dodge rolls, but increases damage taken at all times. 
A vestige of the crucible of primordial life. Born partially of devolution, it was considered a signifier of the divine in ancient times, but is now increasingly disdained as an impurity as civilization has advanced.

talismans.name: Silver Scarab
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things. 
This silver scarab enhances item discovery.

talismans.name: Gold Scarab
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things. 
This golden scarab increases the amount of runes obtained from defeating enemies.

talismans.name: Red-Feathered Branchsword
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Attack Power at Low HP +20%
effectDescriptionList: Improved Attack Power at Low HP + 20%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman adorned with red feathers, once used in ancient death rituals. 
Raises attack power when HP is low. 
The heart sings when one draws close to death, and a glorious end awaits those who cling tenaciously to life.

talismans.name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Damage Negation at Low HP +50%
effectDescriptionList: Improved Damage Negation at Low HP + 50%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman adorned with blue feathers, once used in ancient death rituals. 
Raises damage negation when HP is low. 
The heart sings when one draws close to death, and thus does one cling tenaciously to life  to render up a death worth offering.

talismans.name: Ritual Sword Talisman
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Attack Power at Full HP +10%
effectDescriptionList: Improved Attack Power at Full HP + 10%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman patterned after swords used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree. 
Raises attack power when HP is at maximum. 
The practice had died out by the age of King Consort Radagon, but remains of the arenas where ritual combat took place can still be found in every land.

talismans.name: Ritual Shield Talisman
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Damage Negation at Full HP +30%
effectDescriptionList: Improved Damage Negation at Full HP +30% + 30%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman patterned after shields used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree. 
Raises damage negation when HP is at maximum. 
The practice had died out by the age of King Consort Radagon, but remains of the arenas Where ritual combat took place can still be found in every land.

talismans.name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
talismans.flavorText:
An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in crimson. 
Critical hits restore HP.
This charm is modelled after the darkly gleaming blades used in the Night of Black Knives Those which gave the demigods their first taste of Death

talismans.name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
talismans.flavorText:
An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in cerulean
Critical hits restore FP. 
This charm is modelled after the darkly gleaming blades used in the Night of Black Knives Those which gave the demigods their first taste of Death

talismans.name: Winged Sword Insignia
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting a raised prosthetic blade. An honor bestowed upon the knights who fought alongside Malenia the Severed. 
Raises attack power with successive attacks. 
The wings symbolize Malenia and her undefeated prowess. Though she never knew relief from the accursed rot she was born into, her blade was forever beautiful  and relentless.

talismans.name: Millicent's Prosthesis
talismans.effectDescription: Improved Dexterity +5, Successive Attacks Boost Attack Power
talismans.flavorText:
Part of the golden prosthesis used by Millicent. The hand is locked into a fist that once raised a sword aloft. 
Boosts dexterity and raises attack power with successive attacks. 
The despair of sweet betrayal transformed Millicent from a mere bud into a magnificent flower. And one day, she will be reborn  as a beautiful scarlet valkyrie.

talismans.name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
talismans.flavorText:
Sacred cloth of the Godskin Apostles, made from supple skin sewn together. 
Successive attacks restore HP. 
The Gloam-Eyed Queen cradles newborn apostles swaddled in this cloth. Soon they will grow to become the death of the gods.

talismans.name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting the exultation of pests. 
Raises attack power when poisoning or rot occurs in the Vicinity. 
"Rot for the scarlet goddess. O scarlet blossoms, flourish in distant lands, and return to us, the unwanted children."

talismans.name: Lord of Blood's Exultation
talismans.effectDescription: Blood Loss in Vicinity Increases Attack Power +20%
effectDescriptionList: Blood Loss in Vicinity Increases Attack Powe + 20%
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman depicting the exultation of the Lord of Blood. 
Raises attack power when blood loss occurs in the Vicinity. 
"Render up your offerings of blood to your Lord. Drench my consort's chamber. Slake his cocoon's thirst. His awakening shall herald the dawn of our dynasty."

talismans.name: Taker's Cameo
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman engraved with a stern likeness of Praetor Rykard, master of Volcano Manor. 
Restores HP upon defeating enemies. 
When Rykard turned to heresy, taking by force became the rule. The gods themselves were no different, after all.

talismans.name: Ancestral Spirit's Horn
talismans.flavorText:
Item cut from the horns of the Regal Ancestor Spirit. 
Restore FP upon defeating enemies
A number ofnew growths bud from the antler-like horns of the fallen king; each glowing with light: Thus does new life grow from death, and from death, one obtains power.

talismans.name: Sacrificial Twig
talismans.effectDescription: No Rune Loss or Level Down Upon Death
effectDescriptionList: No Rune Loss or Level Down Upon Death
talismans.flavorText:
A talisman fashioned from a dried twig, so slender that it might snap at the slightest touch. 
Prevents rune loss upon death, and avoids levelling down, but the talisman itself will be lost in exchange. 
Believed to be a twig pruned from the Erdtree long, long ago.

talismans.name: Shard of Alexander
talismans.effectDescription: Greatly boosts the attack power of Skills.

talismans.name: Symbol of Avarice
talismans.flavorText:
"Head of the avaricious creature that mimics treasure chests.
Increases runes obtained from defeated enemies as well as item discovery, but the curse of the branded also drains HP.
This creature's very shape is thought to be the result of a form brandinga punishment for sin."

relics.name: Delicate Tranquil Scene
relics.wikiTextDescription: Delicate Tranquil Scene is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be randomly obtaining by completing runs in Limveld, or purchased from a merchant in the Roundtable Hold. This relic has green color, and comes with 1 random effect.
relics.flavorText:
A relic that grants its favor upon departure on an expedition. Can be placed on the pedestal's green sand.
The scenes within are the memories of warriors, that allow one to draw upon their minds for strength.
A tranquil scene recalls strolls through lush tracts of deep green.

relics.name: Besmirched Frame
relics.wikiTextDescription: Besmirched Frame is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for All Nightfarers. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Besmirched Frame relic can be slotted in blue slot.
