relics.name: Black Claw Necklace
effectDescriptionList: Defeating enemies near Totem Stela restores HP
Defeating enemies fills more of the Art gauge
relics.wikiTextDescription: Black Claw Necklace is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Raider. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Black Claw Necklace relic can be slotted in yellow slot.
relics.flavorText:
A small frame that is missing its picture. Whatever precious memory it once enshrined, now is home only to dust and grime.
A voice is heard that beckons one to seek the owner.
Peer into this window, and revisit the first glimpse of night...

relics.name: Blessed Flowers
effectDescriptionList: [Executor] While Character Skill is active, unlocking use of cursed sword restores HP
relics.wikiTextDescription: Blessed Flowers is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Executor. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Blessed Flowers relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
A necklace made from a thick rugged claw, with a shining black luster that instils fear in any who gaze upon it.
Long ago, the Raider fought the king of the archipelago forest. He grappled the hulking beast with his iron grip, and flung him away, proving his strength. He claimed the king's broken claw as a trophy and testament to his victory.
For a time, the Raider devoted himself to exploits on the high seas, but he tired of the unending struggle that never seemed to determine a clear victor. And so, he delivered the claw to his arch nemesis as an invitation to duel to the death.

relics.name: Blessed Iron Coin
effectDescriptionList: [Duchess] Defeating enemies while Art is active ups attack power
relics.wikiTextDescription: Blessed Iron Coin is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Duchess. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Blessed Iron Coin relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
Altus flowers flush with nutrients and grace. Before, such flowers were commonplace on the Altus Plateau.
The vibrant hues suggest that the flowers received plenty of sunlight, and appear to shine in an ode to the resplendent Erdtree.

relics.name: Bone-Like Stone
effectDescriptionList: [Recluse] Activating Ultimate Art raises Max HP
[Recluse] Suffer blood loss and increase attack power upon Art activation
relics.wikiTextDescription: Bone-Like Stone is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Recluse. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Bone-Like Stone relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
An iron coin imbued with a small blessing by the priestess. Emits a faint warmth.
The girl made a wish to the mechanical doll... That a blessing would reach hima blessing that could open the eyes of one who is already dead but refuses to accept it.

relics.name: Cracked Sealing Wax
relics.wikiTextDescription: Cracked Sealing Wax is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Ironeye. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Cracked Sealing Wax relic can be slotted in yellow slot.
relics.flavorText:
A disturbing stone with a distinct lifelessness.
The bone of an outer god with the power to expunge divine essence, but that can also be destroyed by the same essence.
The choice was left to the witch. As per the wishes of the one who bestowed it.

relics.name: Cracked Witch's Brooch
effectDescriptionList: [Guardian] Slowly restores nearby allies' HP while Art is active
[Guardian] Reflect a portion of damage received when ability is activated
relics.wikiTextDescription: Cracked Witch's Brooch is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Guardian. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Cracked Witch's Brooch relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
Sealing wax removed from an opened letter. Used by sellswords of the Fellowship.
The stamp signifies an assassin's oath. Once a target is agreed upon, there is no going back.
Such contracts are said to have their origin in the Lands Between.

relics.name: Crown Medal
effectDescriptionList: [Duchess] Dagger chain attack reprises event upon enemies
relics.wikiTextDescription: Crown Medal is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Duchess. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Crown Medal relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
A cracked brooch, bereft of its former magic. A blood magic crystal received from the Recluse.
This brooch powered the accursed Ictarus weapons that once robbed the Pinionfolk of flight.
The Guardian smashed the jewel at the core of this magic implement. To think it was once a mere ceremonial tool to calm violent winds.

relics.name: Edge of Order
effectDescriptionList: [Ironeye] Boosts thrusting counterattacks after executing Art
relics.wikiTextDescription: Edge of Order is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Ironeye. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Edge of Order relic can be slotted in yellow slot.
relics.flavorText:
A medal adorning a doll resembling a young girl. An extra decoration for the Revenant's garb.
The silver shines with a brilliance that is both ceremonial and dignified.
It recalls the girl's words. "With strength comes the burden of duty."

relics.name: Fell Omen Fetish
relics.wikiTextDescription: Fell Omen Fetish is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for All Nightfarers. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Fell Omen Fetish relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
A fragment of the spear of Fulghor, Champion of Nightglow. Imbued with holy essence through battles in Limveld.
Can briefly, and only with very limited potency, grant its power to other armaments.
When Those Who Live in Death are felled by the Order, they will never rise again.

relics.name: Golden Dew
effectDescriptionList: Boosts Attack Power of Added Affinity Attacks
relics.wikiTextDescription: Golden Dew is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Duchess. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Golden Dew relic can be slotted in yellow slot.
relics.flavorText:
A fetish bathed in golden magic.
Shackles were used to bind the accursed people called the Omen, and these ones were made to keep a particular Omen under strictest confinement.
But the magic has long faded, leaving only a dark stain in its wake.
The protector of gold yet stands guard over the realm, even after being swallowed by Night.

relics.name: Golden Sprout
effectDescriptionList: [Executor] Roaring restores HP while Art is active
Slowly restore HP for self and nearby allies when HP is low
relics.wikiTextDescription: Golden Sprout is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Executor. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Golden Sprout relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
Liquid plant extract that is highly effective at repairing armaments. Harvested in indeterminate locations across the Lands Between, but only by those who are aware of its useful properties.
This viscous oil can be extracted by squeezing the flower, seeds and all. Some call the liquid golden dew, owing to its lustrous yellow hue.

relics.name: Old Pocketwatch
relics.wikiTextDescription: Old Pocketwatch is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for All Nightfarers. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Old Pocketwatch relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
A golden seed harboring a warm blessing. This one was found on a steep and snowy peak.
This seed sprouted despite the harshness of its environment, like youthful potential blossoming in the crucible of adversity.
Or, what may be called a miracle.

relics.name: Old Portrait
effectDescriptionList: [Revenant] Trigger ghostflame explosion during Ultimate Art activation
[Revenant] Extend own HP to fully heal nearby allies when activating Art
Defeating enemies fills more of the Art gauge
relics.wikiTextDescription: Old Portrait is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Revenant. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Old Portrait relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
A well-kept antique pocketwatch engraved with an intricate design, likely a prized possession.
The influence of the encroaching Night clung to the expecting woman, preventing her from ever giving birth. The only means to break it meant the sacrifice of her life.
But the curse of Night lived on, in both the orphan and in this keepsake, whose hands tell only twisted time.
This dark power is both a badge of lost innocence, and the very thing that allows its owner to fight back.

relics.name: Silver Tear
effectDescriptionList: [Wylder] Art gauge greatly filled when ability is activated
relics.wikiTextDescription: Silver Tear is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Wylder. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Silver Tear relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
An intricate painting of a girl of pure heart and an elderly companion that conveys both trust and affection.
On that night, the doll understoodthe young girl wished to live. And with that understanding, the doll found her purpose.
On the back of the painting is a hurriedly scrawled, fading message.
"Chloe, seek happiness, for you deserve it more than anyone."

relics.name: Slate Whetstone
effectDescriptionList: [Wylder] Follow-up attacks possible when using Character Skill (greatsword only)
relics.wikiTextDescription: Slate Whetstone is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Wylder. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Slate Whetstone relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
A kernel of life that straddles the living and inanimate. Also known as a Larval Tear.
Once, in the Lands Between, it was said to have granted one a new form.

relics.name: Small Makeup Brush
effectDescriptionList: [Revenant] Power up while fighting alongside family
Increased rune acquisition for self and allies
relics.wikiTextDescription: Small Makeup Brush is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Revenant. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Small Makeup Brush relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
A natural whetstone of high quality with a fine grain. A precious sharpening stone mined in Limveld.
The clash with Night has spanned eons. And yet now, precious little time remains.

relics.name: Stone Stake
relics.wikiTextDescription: Stone Stake is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Guardian. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Stone Stake relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
Tool for accentuating the beauty of people and things. One of the Iron Menial's favorite items.
Though plain it is a reliable tool, with a soft-bristled brush that delicately applies ceruse to skin or other surfaces.
"Your beauty deserves nothing less."

relics.name: The Wylder's Earring
effectDescriptionList: [Wylder] Art activation spreads fire in area
Stamina recovers with each successful attack
relics.wikiTextDescription: The Wylder's Earring is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Wylder. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. The Wylder's Earring relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
A stone stake that opens a sealed-away lock.
Crafted by an ancient civilization and claimed from a Guardian Golem.
Still imbued with an old yet fading magic. Can open locks sealed in a similar manner to the golem.

relics.name: Third Volume
effectDescriptionList: [Guardian] Creates whirlwind when charging halberd attacks
relics.wikiTextDescription: Third Volume is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Guardian. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Third Volume relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
A single earring belonging to the Wylder. Rusted and encrusted with grime.
Such ornaments were worn for generations by a distant tribe. They are delicately embellished to cast a pattern when held up to light.
A relic of the Lord who lumbered ever onward, clutching tight this single ornament.

relics.name: Torn Braided Cord
effectDescriptionList: [Raider] Damage taken while using Character Skill improves attack power and stamina
relics.wikiTextDescription: Torn Braided Cord is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Raider. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Torn Braided Cord relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
Annals detailing the histories of certain cursed weapons speak of a conflict far to the west.
An account mentions one such accursed weapon called an Ictarus.
"The blades shared an identical engraving. A symbol of the sorcery of a distant land. A script put down in blood."

relics.name: Vestige of Night
effectDescriptionList: [Recluse] Collecting affinity residue activates Terra Magica
relics.wikiTextDescription: Vestige of Night is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Recluse. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Vestige of Night relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
A torn magic-warding braided cord. Worn by warriors for good luck on the eve of battle.
The distinctive stone clasp suggests that it belonged to glory-seeking pirates.
The legends surrounding the competing seafaring factions, who divided the seas into east and west, have been spoken of for generations in places near and far.

relics.name: Witch's Brooch
effectDescriptionList: [Guardian] Slowly restores nearby allies' HP while Art is active
[Guardian] Reflect a portion of damage received when ability is activates
relics.wikiTextDescription: Witch's Brooch is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by progressing or completing remembrance questline for Guardian. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Witch's Brooch relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
A clear sign of the Nightlord's presence, in the form of a terribly tattered rag.
Burned and worn down over a span of time untold, the hint of an impression once made by the engraving of an old sealing stone can be seen, but it is no longer legible.
The menial asked about an engraving. But how did he know there was one, before setting eyes upon it?

relics.name: Night of the Baron
effectDescriptionList: Art gauge fills moderately upon critical hit
Critical Hit Boosts Stamina Recovery Speed
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Baron is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Baron relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
A brooch imbued with potent magic, made from the blood magic crystal received from the Recluse.
This brooch powered the accursed Ictarus weapons that once robbed the Pinionfolk of flight.
At first, this magic brooch, with its aura of unknowable power, was intended as a ceremonial tool to calm violent winds.
But the war, for better or worse, demanded that it be employed otherwise, as a magic artifact to bring a swift end to the conflict.

relics.name: Night of the Beast
effectDescriptionList: Stamina recovers with each successful attack +1
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Beast is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 2 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Beast relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Adel, left upon his defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
The dragon was nothing less than a wonder of the natural world. Majestic in size and bearing, it was the apex predator of the old island upon which it roosted.
But when the sky began to weep in hues of azure, all was lost. There was nothing left to feed upon, leaving only hunger, which grew into madness. A ravening unending.

relics.name: Night of the Champion
effectDescriptionList: Guard counter is given a boost based on current HP
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Champion is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Champion relic can be slotted in green slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Gladius, left upon its defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
The wolf pup, born with its three heads, was feared by its peers and driven out of the pack, but its will to live was strong indeed.
Upon a rainswept night, it seized a man's sword with its great jaws, but he showed no fear. He did not seek to harm the wolf, but instead took it in his arms.
It has remained at his side ever since, always carrying that very sword.

relics.name: Night of the Demon
effectDescriptionList: Huge rune discount for shop purchases while on expedition
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Demon is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Demon relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Fulghor, left upon his defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
The left arm of the loyal and brave servant of the gods had been severed from behind. As he turned back to look, he fell to despair.
It seemed his companions, who had walked with him upon the same perilous path, had now forsworn the very gods they once served.

relics.name: Night of the Fathom
effectDescriptionList: Items confer effect to all nearby allies
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Fathom is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Fathom relic can be slotted in red slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Libra, left upon its defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
The demon was obsessed with the concepts of impartiality, fairness, and equanimity. For anything to reach a higher plane each side must elevate the other.
The goat-eyed being gazed into the darkness. If it is true, that the night swallows all, then the night is impartial.
The night is a thing of fairness, of equanimity. The night is a champion of balance.

relics.name: Night of the Lord
effectDescriptionList: Switching Weapons Adds an Affinity Attack
Boosts Attack Power of Added Affinity Attacks
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Lord is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Lord relic can be slotted in blue slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Maris, left upon its defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
For the first time in its existence, the drifting ancient being realized its interest had been piqued.
Indeed, it had been roused from its aimless life of floating, camouflaged within its surroundings.
The strange taste of this night was all too lonely, and more vast than it could ever know.

relics.name: Night of the Miasma
effectDescriptionList: Changes compatible armament's skill to Chilling Mist at start of expedition
Attack power up when facing frostbite-afflicted enemy
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Miasma is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Miasma relic can be slotted in yellow slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Heolstor, left upon its defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
The country lay in ruin. The man who once was knight had challenged the hero, but he too was no match. He fell, just another body in a great pile.
But eventually he awoke, crawling out from underneath the others. Though he had failed to protect anything or anyone, he yet lived. And so he cursed the world.
It was the dead of night, and from the sky poured down a great rain.

relics.name: Night of the Wise
effectDescriptionList: Poison & Rot in Vicinity Increases Attack Power
relics.wikiTextDescription: Night of the Wise is a relic in Elden Ring: Nightreign, which can be obtained by defeating a specific Nightlord. This relic comes with 3 predetermined passive effects. Night of the Wise relic can be slotted in yellow slot.
relics.flavorText:
The night belonging to Caligo, left upon her defeat.
The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite.
From the phantasmal peak upon which she hid herself, she peered down into the world, committing to memory what she perceived.
Then, her eye drawn to a certain cataclysm, from out of hiding she leapt with wings unfurled.
For she wished to know and to understand, first hand, just what fortunes and misfortunes the disaster would bring upon the world.

relicEffects.effectDescription: Attack power increases after using grease items

relicEffects.name: Relic Effect
relicEffects.effectDescription: Improved Attack Power with 3+ Greatswords Equipment

relicEffects.name: Relic Effect
relicEffects.effectDescription: Improved Attack Power with 3+ Great SpearsEquipped

relicEffects.name: Relic Effect
relicEffects.effectDescription: Improved Attack Power with 3+ Katanas Equipped
